paramInformation.label: True Period
paramInformation.description: Time of switching status to send status message in 100ms, so default of 10 = 1000ms = 1 sec

paramInformation.label: Send Out Basic Command
paramInformation.description: Enable or Disable the status message function

paramInformation.label: Meter Report Period
paramInformation.description: Autoreporting meter value interval in 10 secs, so default of 3 = 30 secs
